amendment.description: To authorize the use of funds to carry out a matching program with the Department of Education to identify veterans who are unemployable due to a service-connected disability and who are also borrowers of Federal student loans in order to streamline and expedite the process through which such veterans may discharge their Federal student loans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3934 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3934 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator King to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2868-2869; text: CR S2868) To authorize the use of funds to carry out a matching program with the Department of Education to identify veterans who are unemployable due to a service-connected disability and who are also borrowers of Federal student loans in order to streamline and expedite the process through which such veterans may discharge their Federal student loans.
